chapter.title: Janela: Fluxo de Trabalho
chapter.para: Descrição: Gerenciamento de Fluxo de Trabalho
Comentário/Ajuda: A Janela "Fluxo de Trabalho" define Fluxos de Trabalho no sistema, o nível de acesso para o Fluxo de Trabalho e os Nós ou Passos dentro do Fluxo de Trabalho.

section.title: Tabela: Fluxo de Trabalho - AD_Workflow
section.para: Descrição: Definir Fluxo de Trabalho
Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Fluxo de Trabalho" define os Fluxos de Trabalho no sistema.
Nível da tabela: 0

row.entry: Overlap Units are number of units that must be completed before they are moved the next activity
When there are two consecutive avtivity, you can sometimes save time by moving partial quantites from one activity to the next before the first activity as been completed.
The Units by Cycles are defined for process type Flow Repetitive Dedicated and indicated the product to be manufactured on a production line for duration unit.
When Units by Cycles are defined the duration time is the total of time to manufactured the units
The Workflow field identifies a unique Workflow in the system.
Batch Flow Continuous Flow Dedicate Repetititive Flow Job Shop Mixed Repetitive Flow Plant
The Yield is the percentage of a lot that is expected to be of acceptable wuality may fall below 100 percent

ADempiere Calculate the total yield for a product from the yield for each activity when the process Workflow Cost Roll-Up is executed.
The expected yield for an Activity can be expressed as:
Yield = Acceptable Units at Activity End x 100
The Total manufacturing yield for a product is determined by multiplying the yied percentage for each activity.
Manufacturing Yield = Yield % for Activity 10 x Yied % for Activity 20 , etc
Take care when setting yield to anything but 100% particularly when yied is used for multiples activities
Queue time is the time a job waits at a work center before begin handled.
Queuing time has no implication on costs, but on Capacity Requirement Planning (CRP) to calculate the total time needed to manufacture a product.
Document sequence number of the document

The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "< > ".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_< TableName> ", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
The Help field contains a hint, comment or help about the use of this item.
Beta functionality is not fully tested or completed.
Geral Manufacturing Processar Documentos Quality Valor do Documento Wizard (G)
The type of workflow determines how the workflow is started.
The Database Table provides the information of the table definition
Logic to determine Workflow Start - If true, a workflow process is started for the document

You can enter simple logic using variables like @Created@=@Updated@, which fires, when a record is created. If you need to evaluate also values of other records, you need to use SQL logic and need to prefix this logic with "SQL=". Example: start a Order verify workflow, when a business partner ordered something and is over the credit limit "SQL=EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE C_Order. C_BPartner_ID=bp. C_BPartner_ID AND SO_CreditUsed > SO_CreditLimit)". Note that the SQL based logic checks for duplicate workflows (i.e. a workflow is started only once per record).
Organização Somente Cliente Empresa+Organização Somente Sistema Sistema+Cliente (Empresa) Todos
Indicates the access level required for this record or process.
Dictionary Entity Type; Determines ownership and synchronization

The Entity Types "Dictionary", "iDempiere" and "Application" might be automatically synchronized and customizations deleted or overwritten.
For customizations, copy the entity and select "User"!
The ultimate responsibility for a workflow is with an actual user. The Workflow Responsible allows to define ways to find that actual User.
Indicates if this request is of a high, medium or low priority.
The Priority indicates the importance of this request.
Valid from including this date (first day)
The Valid From date indicates the first day of a date range
Valid to including this date (last day)
The Valid To date indicates the last day of a date range
The Version indicates the version of this table definition.
The Default Checkbox indicates if this record will be used as a default value.
The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.
Dia hora minuto Mês segundo Ano
Unit to define the length of time for the execution
Maximum (critical) Duration for time management purposes (e.g. starting an escalation procedure, etc.) in Duration Units.
Expected (normal) Length of time for the execution
Amount of time the performer of the activity needs to perform the task in Duration Unit
Amount of time needed to prepare the performance of the task on Duration Units
AD_CtxHelp_ID IN (SELECT AD_CtxHelp_ID FROM AD_CtxHelp WHERE CtxType IS NULL OR CtxType IN ('A', 'W'))
The element passed the validation check

section.title: Tabela: Nó - AD_WF_Node
section.para: Descrição: Definir Nós de Fluxo de Trabalho

Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Nó" define cada Nó, Atividade ou passo neste Fluxo de Trabalho. O tipo de ação (atividade) determina a execução: "Rota" pode ser usada em condições de controle de roteamento. "Nenhum" identifica execução manual.
Nível da tabela: 1

row.entry: The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.
The Yield is the percentage of a lot that is expected to be of acceptable wuality may fall below 100 percent

ADempiere Calculate the total yield for a product from the yield for each activity when the process Workflow Cost Roll-Up is executed.
The expected yield for an Activity can be expressed as:
Yield = Acceptable Units at Activity End x 100
The Total manufacturing yield for a product is determined by multiplying the yied percentage for each activity.
Manufacturing Yield = Yield % for Activity 10 x Yied % for Activity 20 , etc
Take care when setting yield to anything but 100% particularly when yied is used for multiples activities
Valid from including this date (first day)
The Valid From date indicates the first day of a date range
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
Absolute Y (vertical) position in 1/72 of an inch
Absolute Y (vertical) position in 1/72 of an inch
Absolute X (horizontal) position in 1/72 of an inch
Absolute X (horizontal) position in 1/72 of an inch
Overlap Units are number of units that must be completed before they are moved the next activity
When there are two consecutive avtivity, you can sometimes save time by moving partial quantites from one activity to the next before the first activity as been completed.
The Units by Cycles are defined for process type Flow Repetitive Dedicated and indicated the product to be manufactured on a production line for duration unit.
When Units by Cycles are defined the duration time is the total of time to manufactured the units
The Workflow field identifies a unique Workflow in the system.
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
The Help field contains a hint, comment or help about the use of this item.
Information maintained in System Element table
The Centrally Maintained checkbox indicates if the Name, Description and Help maintained in 'System Element' table or 'Window' table.
Dictionary Entity Type; Determines ownership and synchronization

The Entity Types "Dictionary", "iDempiere" and "Application" might be automatically synchronized and customizations deleted or overwritten.
For customizations, copy the entity and select "User"!
The ultimate responsibility for a workflow is with an actual user. The Workflow Responsible allows to define ways to find that actual User.
Indicates if this request is of a high, medium or low priority.
The Priority indicates the importance of this request.
How is the execution of an activity triggered. Automatic are triggered implicitly by the system, Manual explicitly by the User.
How the system operated at the end of an activity. Automatic implies return when the invoked applications finished control - Manual the user has to explicitly terminate the activity.
Semantics for multiple incoming Transitions for a Node/Activity. AND joins all concurrent threads - XOR requires one thread (no synchronization).
Semantics for multiple outgoing Transitions for a Node/Activity. AND represents multiple concurrent threads - XOR represents the first transition with a true Transition condition.

User Workbench Escolha do Usuário Ação do Documento Sub Fluxo de Trabalho User Info Email Processo de Aplicação Relatório de Aplicação Tarefa de Aplicação Ajustar Variável Janela de Usuário Formulário do Usuário Espera (Dormir) (Z)
Indicates the Action to be performed
The Action field is a drop down list box which indicates the Action to be performed for this Item.

Images and Icon can be used to display supported graphic formats (gif, jpg, png). You can either load the image (in the database) or point to a graphic via a URI (i.e. it can point to a resource, http address)
The Info window is used to search and select records as well as display information relevant to the selection.
The Window field identifies a unique Window in the system.
The Special Form field identifies a unique Special Form in the system.
Link to the database column of the table
iDempiere converts the (string) field values to the attribute data type. Booleans (Yes-No) may have the values "true" and "false", the date format is YYYY-MM-DD
Document Business Partner Document Owner WF Responsible

The Email Address is the Electronic Mail ID for this User and should be fully qualified (e.g. joe.smith@company.com). The Email Address is used to access the self service application functionality from the web.

The Mail Template indicates the mail template for return messages. Mail text can include variables. The priority of parsing is User/Contact, Business Partner and then the underlying business object (like Request, Dunning, Workflow object). So, @Name@ would resolve into the User name (if user is defined defined), then Business Partner name (if business partner is defined) and then the Name of the business object if it has a Name. For Multi-Lingual systems, the template is translated based on the Business Partner's language selection.
Maximum (critical) Duration for time management purposes (e.g. starting an escalation procedure, etc.) in Duration Units.
The Task field identifies a Operation System Task in the system.
The Workflow field identifies a unique workflow. A workflow is a grouping of related tasks, in a specified sequence and optionally including approvals
Mode how the sub-workflow is executed
A workflow execution block is optional and allows all work to be performed in a single transaction. If one step (node activity) fails, the entire work is rolled back.
The Process field identifies a unique Process or Report in the system.

< Nenhum>
Aprovar Fechar Completo Invalidar Lançar Preparar Estornar - Provisão Estornar - Corrigir Reativar Rejeitar Anulado Espere Completar Destravar (CO)
The targeted status of the document
You find the current status in the Document Status field. The options are listed in a popup
Time in minutes to be suspended (sleep)
Change of priority when Activity is suspended waiting for user
Starting with the Process / Node priority level, the priority of the suspended activity can be changed dynamically. Example +5 every 10 minutes
Change of priority when Activity is suspended waiting for user
Starting with the Process / Node priority level, the priority of the suspended activity can be changed dynamically. Example +5 every 10 minutes
Expected (normal) Length of time for the execution
Amount of time the performer of the activity needs to perform the task in Duration Unit
Amount of time needed to prepare the performance of the task on Duration Units
AD_CtxHelp_ID IN (SELECT AD_CtxHelp_ID FROM AD_CtxHelp WHERE CtxType IS NULL OR CtxType IN ('A', 'N'))

section.title: Tabela: Parâmetro - AD_WF_Node_Para
section.para: Descrição: Parâmetro de Nó de Fluxo de Trabalho
Comentário/Ajuda: Parâmetro para a execução do Nó de Fluxo de Trabalho
Lógica de visualização: @Action@=P|@Action@=R
Nível da tabela: 2

row.entry: Parâmetro de Nó de Fluxo de Trabalho
Parameter for the execution of the Workflow Node
The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.
iDempiere converts the (string) field values to the attribute data type. Booleans (Yes-No) may have the values "true" and "false", the date format is YYYY-MM-DD
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
Dictionary Entity Type; Determines ownership and synchronization

The Entity Types "Dictionary", "iDempiere" and "Application" might be automatically synchronized and customizations deleted or overwritten.
For customizations, copy the entity and select "User"!

section.title: Tabela: Tradução de Nó - AD_WF_Node_Trl
section.para: Descrição: Tradução de Nó
Claúsula Where: AD_Language NOT IN (SELECT AD_Language FROM AD_Client WHERE AD_Client_ID=@#AD_Client_ID@)
Nível da tabela: 2

row.entry: The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.
The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting
The Translated checkbox indicates if this column is translated.
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
The Help field contains a hint, comment or help about the use of this item.

section.title: Tabela: Bloco - AD_WF_Block
section.para: Descrição: Bloco de Execução de Transação de Fluxo de Trabalho

Comentário/Ajuda: Um Bloco de Execução de Fluxo de Trabalho é opcional e permite que todo o trabalho seja executado em uma única transação. Se um passo (atividade de nó) falhar, todo o trabalho é desfeito.
Nível da tabela: 1

row.entry: A workflow execution block is optional and allows all work to be performed in a single transaction. If one step (node activity) fails, the entire work is rolled back.
The Workflow field identifies a unique Workflow in the system.
The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.

section.title: Tabela: Transição - AD_WF_NodeNext
section.para: Descrição: Transição de Nó de Fluxo de Trabalho
Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Próximos Nós" define a ordem ou Nós, ou Passos em um Fluxo de Trabalho.
Nível da tabela: 2

row.entry: The Next Nodes Tab defines the order or Nodes or Steps in a Workflow.
The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.
The Next Node indicates the next step or task in this Workflow.
Method of ordering records; lowest number comes first
The Sequence indicates the order of records
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
Fluxo de Trabalho do Usuário Padrão

If selected, only documents with an open status (drafted, in progress, approved, rejected, invalid) and standard user actions (prepare, complete, approve, reject) are allowed to continue. Use this to prevent having to define details on how automatic processes (unlock, invalidate, post, re-activate) and when the document is closed for normal user action (completed, waiting, closed, voided, reversed).
Code resulting in TRUE of FALSE
The transition is executed, if the code results in TRUE (or is empty)
Dictionary Entity Type; Determines ownership and synchronization

The Entity Types "Dictionary", "iDempiere" and "Application" might be automatically synchronized and customizations deleted or overwritten.
For customizations, copy the entity and select "User"!

section.title: Tabela: Condição - AD_WF_NextCondition
section.para: Descrição: Condição de Transição de Nó de Fluxo de Trabalho

Comentário/Ajuda: Restrição Opcional para transições entre nós. Operações são convertidas em tipo de dados booleanos para retornar true ou false. Quando condicional verdadeira (true) atribui o WF para o nó pai da condicional. EX. SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) FROM RV_OpenItem opi WHERE opi.C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@ .. .. ..
Nível da tabela: 3

row.entry: Optional restriction of transition of one node to the next
The Next Nodes Tab defines the order or Nodes or Steps in a Workflow.
(@SQL=SELECT COALESCE(MAX(SeqNo),0)+10 AS DefaultValue FROM AD_WF_NextCondition WHERE AD_WF_NodeNext_ID=@AD_WF_NodeNext_ID@)
Method of ordering records; lowest number comes first
The Sequence indicates the order of records
Link to the database column of the table
Dictionary Entity Type; Determines ownership and synchronization

The Entity Types "Dictionary", "iDempiere" and "Application" might be automatically synchronized and customizations deleted or overwritten.
For customizations, copy the entity and select "User"!

section.title: Tabela: Acesso - AD_Workflow_Access
section.para: Descrição: Acesso a Fluxos de Trabalho
Comentário/Ajuda: A Aba "Acesso a Fluxos de Trabalho" define os Papéis (Funções) que tem acesso a este Fluxo de Trabalho.
Coluna linkada: Workflow
Nível da tabela: 1

row.entry: The Workflow field identifies a unique Workflow in the system.
The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.
The Read Write indicates that this field may be read and updated.

section.title: Tabela: Nó Anterior - AD_WF_NodeNext
section.para: Coluna linkada: Node Transition
Nível da tabela: 2

row.entry: The Next Nodes Tab defines the order or Nodes or Steps in a Workflow.
The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.
The Next Node indicates the next step or task in this Workflow.
Method of ordering records; lowest number comes first
The Sequence indicates the order of records
Optional short description of the record
A description is limited to 255 characters.
Code resulting in TRUE of FALSE
The transition is executed, if the code results in TRUE (or is empty)
Fluxo de Trabalho do Usuário Padrão

If selected, only documents with an open status (drafted, in progress, approved, rejected, invalid) and standard user actions (prepare, complete, approve, reject) are allowed to continue. Use this to prevent having to define details on how automatic processes (unlock, invalidate, post, re-activate) and when the document is closed for normal user action (completed, waiting, closed, voided, reversed).
Dictionary Entity Type; Determines ownership and synchronization

The Entity Types "Dictionary", "iDempiere" and "Application" might be automatically synchronized and customizations deleted or overwritten.
For customizations, copy the entity and select "User"!
